Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Seminar: New Research in Energy System Modelling

Messages.Author: Philipp Glaum
Messages.Content: Dear students,  If you want to take the "New Research in ESM" seminar, you must complete your binding registration on MTS by 26.05.2024 at 23:59. For those of you who could not attend the introduction today, we have uploaded a recording with more information on how to register. Unfortunately, the recording is somewhat broken and you cannot see the shared presentation. However, we have uploaded the presentation to ISIS.  After the registration, we will announce who got a spot in the seminar, and then you can give your topic preferences.  Best wishes, Philipp

Messages.Author: Iegor Riepin
Messages.Content: Dear students, Welcome to the seminar "New Research in Energy System Modelling"!  Next week, on 21.05.2024 at 14:00 in room C243, the first event of the seminar will take place, where we will present how the seminar is organised, as well as the elective topics for the seminar.  After the presentation, you can register for an exam by 26.05.2024, through Moses/MTS. In the following week, we will inform you whether you have received a spot in the seminar, and we will provide you the link to give your preferences for the topics. The presentation next week will also be recorded, and you can digitally join via Zoom (https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/61225034869?pwd=T2ExRXhJVW4zcWl4bWoxb2trU2s5dz09).  Best wishes, Iegor
